inviteLuckyballComment: Wakiriye Umupira Wamahirwe yo gutumira inshuti.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Wakoresheje Umupira Wamahirwe kugirango winjire Amahirwe.
partnerMailContents1: Nyamuneka reba ibyangombwa bisabwa kugirango wemerwe kandi wohereze igisubizo hamwe na dosiye iherekejwe!
partnerMailContents3:
Nyamuneka ongeraho kopi y'indangamuntu yawe cyangwa pasiporo
kugenzura umwirondoro wawe.
partnerMailContents5:
Nyamuneka reba inyandiko nibisabwa
kugirango twemerwe nabafatanyabikorwa kandi utwoherereze igisubizo!
partnerMailContents8:
Nyamuneka twohereze numero ya terefone ushobora kugerwaho
kuvugana numufasha wawe.
partnerMailContents9:
Nyamuneka ohereza igisubizo cyawe ukoresheje imeri kuri mugenzi wawe@buflexz.com .
Nyuma yuko itsinda ryibikorwa rigenzura igisubizo, gusuzuma abafatanyabikorwa no kwemezwa bizakorwa.
authMailContents3: Urufunguzo rwo kwemeza rwatanzwe kugirango rwemeze imeri.
authMailContents4:
Nyamuneka andika imibare 6 yo kwemeza muburyo butaziguye
idirishya muri porogaramu cyangwa gukoporora no gukata nimero yemewe.
authMailContents5:
Iyi imeri ni iyo kohereza gusa.
Ibisubizo ntibishoboka, niba rero ufite ibibazo cyangwa ibitagenda neza,
nyamuneka twandikire ukoresheje ikigo cyabakiriya muri porogaramu ya BUFLEXZ.
